Table1.News title: Celebrate Halloween and Día de los Muertos safely
Table1.News content: The holidays look different this year, but there are still plenty of fun, low-risk, recommended activities you can do.

Table1.News title: Flu season is around the corner
Table1.News content: Simultaneous outbreaks of flu and COVID-19 will drain the state’s health care resources. Getting a flu shot protects you and your family.
Table1.Link text: Find a flu shot near you

Table1.News title: New relief for renters, homeowners, and small landlords
Table1.News content: Legislation took effect Aug. 31 that protects many Californians who are unable to pay their rent or mortgage because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
